MAN.TITLE: genlib
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: build library from all functions in given directory

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Scilab string. The variable name of the library to (re)create.
Scilab string. The name of the directory to look for .bin-files; default value is the current directory.

DESCRIPTION.P: For each .sci file in dir-name, genlib executes a getf and saves the functions to the corresponding .bin file. The .sci file must not contain anything but Scilab functions. If a .bin file is newer than the associated .sci file, genlib does not translate and save the file.
When all .sci files have been processed, genlib creates a library variable named lib-name and saves it in the file lib in dir-name.

ITEMIZE.label: RESTRICTIONS
ITEMIZE.P: Scilab tacitly assumes that file foo.sci defines only a single function named foo.
